meanings.definition: Work jointly on an activity or project.
meanings.sent1: We are collaborating on our science project.
meanings.sent2: The team is collaborating to finish the report on time.
meanings.sent3: Collaborating with my brother on building a fort was so much fun.
meanings.sent4: The dancers were collaborating like a well-oiled machine on stage.
meanings.sent5: Collaborating with friends made the task seem effortless.

meanings.definition: Cooperate with others for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The students are collaborating to clean up the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The countries are collaborating to address climate change.
meanings.sent3: Collaborating with my dog to dig a hole in the backyard was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The birds were collaborating in perfect harmony to build their nests.
meanings.sent5: Collaborating with neighbors made the neighborhood a better place.
